title: Polish banks ranked by brand value in 2015
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Banking Institution in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and lowest at Banking Institution Millennium.
The highest value at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski is 5.4x times more than the lowest value at Millennium.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Banking Institution, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Banking Institution on the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and lowest at Banking Institution Millennium.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Banking Institution in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and lowest at Banking Institution Millennium.
The highest value at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski is 5.4x times more than the lowest value at Millennium.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Banking Institution, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Banking Institution on the y axis.
Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Millennium has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars of Banking Institution Millennium is 5.4% smaller than the maximum value at PKO Bank Polski.
Brand value in million U.S. dollars at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski is 1594.0 , second place is  at 1594.0, and thirdly is Bank Zachodni WBK at 902.0.
The Banking Institution Millennium has 1.95 times less Brand value in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Banking Institutions, we get total 4086.0.
